overview: Anthony Giugliano is the Chief Financial Officer of the Partnership for New York City and the New York City Investment Fund. Prior to joining the Investment Fund, Mr. Giugliano was the Chief Financial Officer at Catholic Charities of Brooklyn and Queens, serving as the organizationâ€™s first CFO in its 100-year history. Previously, he worked extensively in the private sector including various financial positions at Viacom International and Bertelsmann AG. He received a Bachelorâ€™s Degree from Brooklyn College and an MBA from Long Island University.
